p: Following the wide use of phytomedicines as alternatives for preventing and treating COVID-19 in Africa, the Africa Center for disease Control and Prevention (Africa CDC) recommended the development of state-based herbal registries. The mobilization of funds, technical research support and proper communication for the development of such proclaimed remedies have also been emphasized ( Africa CDC, 2020). These activities can help guide the establishment of botanical assets in the management of COVID-19.
